PAD_TrappedInsideLamp.synopsis: PAD played when one of the players gets trapped inside the djnni lamp.
PAD_TrappedInsideLamp.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Go to 49; 0; -144 and try to use the shovel in this area- You can add the shovel with "create OBJ_Tool_Shovel" Recon call- Your character will dig out the treasure chest and you need to pick up the lamp in the chest - the dialog with the lamp should be triggered- Touch the lamp in the dialog- The player that touched the lamp will play the PAD

Antagonist_InsideLamp.synopsis: For a brief momemnt the first player to get trapped insdie the djinni lamp talks with the trapped djinni before it gets released.The dialog should be very brief, with not input from the player.
Antagonist_InsideLamp.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Try to move/loot |Peculiar lamp| - S_LOW_DjinniTrap_Lamp 41743414-bbea-4f42-8c2f-9c9fe3de1d1e - (-37; 24; -108)- You will be teleported inside the djinni lamp and the djinni will stat the dialog with you

Antagonist_Interrupted.synopsis: The dialog is triggered in case that the player who was trapped in the lamp escapes while the djinni is speaking to other players in LOW_DjinniTrap_Antagonist_0188fd1b-39bb-ffa9-a80b-ea5cc7451d37 dialog.
Antagonist_Interrupted.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Go to 49; 0; -144 and try to use the shovel in this area- You can add the shovel with "create OBJ_Tool_Shovel" Recon call- Your character will dig out the treasure chest and you need to pick up the lamp in the chest - the dialog with the lamp should be triggered- Touch the lamp in the dialog- The djinni will appear and start this dialog with other party members- Cast "Find Familliar" spell with the player who got trapped in the lamp, it will escape and this dialog will be triggered

Antagonist.synopsis: The dialog with the djinni who was trapped in the lamp.Touching the lamp means he's freed, but the person who touched it is now INSIDE the lamp. This dialogue occurs with one of the players outside of the lamp.Yafeu is hovering above the lamp, this player is right in front of the lamp.
Antagonist.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Try to move/loot |Peculiar lamp| - S_LOW_DjinniTrap_Lamp 41743414-bbea-4f42-8c2f-9c9fe3de1d1e - (-37; 24; -108)- When another dialog between player that got trapped and djinni is finished. the djinni will spawn next to the lamp and start this dialog with available players in the room

PAD_TrappedInsideLamp_0.speaker: Player
PAD_TrappedInsideLamp_0.text: What just happened? Where am I?
PAD_TrappedInsideLamp_0.context: NodeContext: Minthara: outraged by the indignity of the situation 'IB-lith, STRAJ-un' (damned, shitty)

Antagonist_InsideLamp_15.speaker: Yafeu
Antagonist_InsideLamp_15.text: A rescuer?! Oh, you've arrived in the nick of time, saintly adventurer - I've been trapped for so long, I daresay I'm half mad, ho-ho!
Antagonist_InsideLamp_15.context: NodeContext: delighted, over the top - hint of madness

Antagonist_InsideLamp_24.speaker: Yafeu
Antagonist_InsideLamp_24.text: Thank you for sacrificing yourself to save me - such courage brings a tear to the eye!
Antagonist_InsideLamp_24.context: NodeContext: delighted, over the top - hint of madness

Antagonist_InsideLamp_2.speaker: Yafeu
Antagonist_InsideLamp_2.text: You see, this glorious lamp is both an oasis and a prison. Someone must be inside it at all times - but you're the first brave enough to take my place.

Antagonist_InsideLamp_3.speaker: Yafeu
Antagonist_InsideLamp_3.text: Thank you ever so much - TOODLES!

Antagonist_InsideLamp_1.speaker: Player
Antagonist_InsideLamp_1.text: I have done nothing of the sort.

Antagonist_InsideLamp_22.speaker: Yafeu
Antagonist_InsideLamp_22.text: So modest - oh, it warms the heart. Now, remember - someone must be in the lamp at all times. TOODLES!
Antagonist_InsideLamp_22.context: NodeContext: delighted, over the top - hint of madness

Antagonist_InsideLamp_4.speaker: Player
Antagonist_InsideLamp_4.text: Release me, or you'll regret it.

Antagonist_InsideLamp_19.speaker: Yafeu
Antagonist_InsideLamp_19.text: No need for such bluster! All you have to do is swap with someone and you're as free as a sounding bird. TOODLES.
Antagonist_InsideLamp_19.context: NodeContext: delighted, over the top - hint of madness

Antagonist_InsideLamp_20.speaker: Player
Antagonist_InsideLamp_20.text: Clever trap - but my patron will do much worse than bind you in a lamp. Free me.

Antagonist_InsideLamp_21.speaker: Yafeu
Antagonist_InsideLamp_21.text: You have a patron? WONDROUS! I'm sure it will happily take your place.
Antagonist_InsideLamp_21.context: NodeContext: delighted, over the top - hint of madness

Antagonist_InsideLamp_9.speaker: Yafeu
Antagonist_InsideLamp_9.text: But until someone swaps you with you, I'm afraid you're stuck in here. TOODLES!
Antagonist_InsideLamp_9.context: NodeContext: delighted, over the top - hint of madness

Antagonist_InsideLamp_7.speaker: Player
Antagonist_InsideLamp_7.text: Interesting, this is the lamp, correct? Every cushion and rug in this place thrums with magic.

Antagonist_InsideLamp_14.speaker: Yafeu
Antagonist_InsideLamp_14.text: Ah, a sorcerer! Such relief - I know one of your prowess will have no issue escaping.
Antagonist_InsideLamp_14.context: NodeContext: delighted, over the top - hint of madness

Antagonist_InsideLamp_16.speaker: Yafeu
Antagonist_InsideLamp_16.text: Simply get someone to swap places with you, or you'll be stuck in here for all eternity. TOODLES!
Antagonist_InsideLamp_16.context: NodeContext: delighted, over the top - hint of madness

Antagonist_InsideLamp_17.speaker: Player
Antagonist_InsideLamp_17.text: High level magic is afoot here, but what?

Antagonist_InsideLamp_5.speaker: Narrator
Antagonist_InsideLamp_5.text: *Touching the lamp seemed to satisfy a condition to the magic trapping the djinni. You realise what this must be.*

Antagonist_InsideLamp_23.speaker: Narrator
Antagonist_InsideLamp_23.text: *Imprisonment. One of the most powerful incantations a wizard can cast. You may be stuck here indefinitely.*

Antagonist_InsideLamp_11.speaker: Yafeu
Antagonist_InsideLamp_11.text: I sense you are deep in thought, my brave new friend.

Antagonist_InsideLamp_10.speaker: Yafeu
Antagonist_InsideLamp_10.text: Do not fret. Until another takes your place - you will have all the time in the many worlds to ponder. TOODLES!
Antagonist_InsideLamp_10.context: NodeContext: delighted, over the top - hint of madness

Antagonist_InsideLamp_13.speaker: Narrator
Antagonist_InsideLamp_13.text: *Try as you might, you can't recall what arcana might be at play here.*

Antagonist_InsideLamp_8.speaker: Yafeu
Antagonist_InsideLamp_8.text: It's too late - the lamp has sunk her claws into you, and is booting me out! Don't like it? Swap with someone else! TOODLES.

Antagonist_Interrupted_2.speaker: Yafeu
Antagonist_Interrupted_2.text: Saintly stars and blessed stones - you escaped!

Antagonist_Interrupted_6.speaker: Yafeu
Antagonist_Interrupted_6.text: I wasn't the ding-a-ling who touched the lamp - but oh well. I do live to serve after all.

Antagonist_Interrupted_3.speaker: Player
Antagonist_Interrupted_3.text: I did - now leave, before I kill you for trapping me.

Antagonist_Interrupted_4.speaker: Yafeu
Antagonist_Interrupted_4.text: You are as gracious as you are skilled. My advice? Destroy the lamp. Toodles!

Antagonist_Interrupted_7.speaker: Player
Antagonist_Interrupted_7.text: Only an idiot would stay trapped in that lamp.

Antagonist_Interrupted_5.speaker: Yafeu
Antagonist_Interrupted_5.text: Seas rose and fell while I rotted in that prison - yet you mock me? Ha. Haha.
Antagonist_Interrupted_5.context: NodeContext: kind of insane and losing his mind at the end - disbeliving, on the brink of violence

Antagonist_Interrupted_1.speaker: Yafeu
Antagonist_Interrupted_1.context: NodeContext: preparing for combat. Vicious and a little insane sounding

Antagonist_2.speaker: Yafeu
Antagonist_2.text: Ah, freedom's sweet nectar, how I missed you!
Antagonist_2.context: NodeContext: just burst out of lamp, currently hovering right above it and speaking to a player just in front of it.

Antagonist_16.speaker: Yafeu
Antagonist_16.text: Oh, my rescuer left behind a servant! Terribly sorry for your loss. I'm sure you're at your wits' end without your master.

Antagonist_25.speaker: Player
Antagonist_25.text: That wasn't my master - I sent in a summon.

Antagonist_6.speaker: Yafeu
Antagonist_6.text: A summon? Curse this wretched head, why did I not think of that? Such ingenuity should be rewarded. Here - good tidings upon you!

Antagonist_5.speaker: Yafeu
Antagonist_5.text: Yafeu the STUPENDOUS! Or was it wondrous... Bah. I am FREE and that is all that matters!

Antagonist_19.speaker: Yafeu
Antagonist_19.text: Know that I will remember your master's sacrifice with great affection... every month or so. But I must be off - I'm a century late for an appointment!

Antagonist_1.speaker: Yafeu
Antagonist_1.text: Now, now - your master touched the lamp like a ding-a-ling - which means this is your problem, not mine!

Antagonist_14.speaker: Yafeu
Antagonist_14.text: But if you're after a fight, so be it. It's been too long since I flexed these gloriously magical muscles. AHA!

Antagonist_0.speaker: Player
Antagonist_0.text: I didn't like my 'master' much anyway.

Antagonist_28.speaker: Yafeu
Antagonist_28.text: Ah, so we have both earned our freedom, have we? Then here, a gift from me to you. A thousand good tidings upon you!

Antagonist_22.speaker: Player
Antagonist_22.text: I am at a loss - if only I had some gold, I'm sure I'd feel better.

Antagonist_8.speaker: Yafeu
Antagonist_8.text: Oh, bless this wretched head - of course! Here - compensation for your loss. A thousand good tidings upon you!

Antagonist_10.speaker: Player
Antagonist_10.text: I would like you to release my companion now, please.

Antagonist_3.speaker: Yafeu
Antagonist_3.text: 'Companion'? Ohhh, I see. Sale of the flesh is an admirable trade - I'm sure you'll find another benefactor!
Antagonist_3.context: NodeContext: he thinks the player is a sex worker and that the player in the lamp was a client

Antagonist_29.speaker: Yafeu
Antagonist_29.text: However, should you wish to trade places with your 'companion', simply touch the lamp! Now, I must be off - I'm a century late for an appointment.

Antagonist_15.speaker: Player
Antagonist_15.text: I know what magic prisons do to a person - that won't happen to my friend.

Antagonist_12.speaker: Yafeu
Antagonist_12.text: Well, if you are so mightily knowledged about the arcane - you know that freeing your friend couldn't be easier!

Antagonist_20.speaker: Yafeu
Antagonist_20.text: Simply put your own hand on the lamp, and take your companion's place. Now, I must be going - I'm horribly late for an appointment.

Antagonist_9.speaker: Player
Antagonist_9.text: On second thought, I don't like my 'companion' that much.

Antagonist_24.speaker: Player
Antagonist_24.text: We don't appreciate being tricked, djinni. Time to die.

Antagonist_4.speaker: Yafeu
Antagonist_4.text: A fight? How adorable. Very well, it's been too long since I flexed these gloriously magical muscles. AHA!

Antagonist_30.speaker: Player
Antagonist_30.text: How dare you - I have no master!

Antagonist_26.speaker: Yafeu
Antagonist_26.text: Ah, then you are a trickster here to try to tempt me back into the lamp?! Well it shall not work!

Antagonist_17.speaker: Yafeu
Antagonist_17.text: Yafeu the MAGNIFICENT will die before being shackled. AHA!
